title: Establishing a trans-atlantic partnership for studying the neural networks for motor skill learning in the human brain
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: The partnership grant fosters exchange between UCL and JOhns Hopkins Medical School, specifically regarding stroke research and rehabilitation Outcome of partnership likely to inform stroke rehabilitation Healthcare
